_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ntfy
author: me@cjstevenson.com

installation.script:
## NTFY Installscript

## update system
apt update
apt -y install --no-install-recommends curl tar

## Variables
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")

cd /mnt/server

## install ntfy
echo -e "download url: https://github.com/binwiederhier/ntfy/releases/download/v2.8.0/ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz"
echo -e "downloading ntfy $VERSION"
curl -sSL -o ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz https://github.com/binwiederhier/ntfy/releases/download/v2.8.0/ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz

echo -e "unzipping ntfy exc"
tar -zxvf ./ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz ntfy

## clear temp stuff
echo -e "deleting temp files"
rm ./ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}.tar.gz
rm -r ./ntfy_2.8.0_linux_${ARCH}

echo -e "creating cache.db"
touch cache.db

echo -e "-------------------------------------------------"
echo -e "Installation completed"
echo -e "-------------------------------------------------"
